name: JAPN 105
title: Advanced Japanese
description: Students carry out advanced-level tasks that involve listening, speaking, reading, and/or writing, and learn how to read and write 100 additional kanji. Further development of cultural knowledge and understanding through critical examination of authentic Japanese materials in a variety of genres, including literary work, expository writing, and films. May be repeated for credit with consent of instructor.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): JAPN 104 or by consent of instructor.
